## connect() function

Connect store with react component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function connect<Stores, P = {}>(): InferableComponentEnhancerWithProps<{
    stores: Stores;
}, P>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[InferableComponentEnhancerWithProps](./reactx.inferablecomponentenhancerwithprops.md)<!-- -->&lt;{ stores: Stores; }, P&gt;
